ModMetaData.name: Automatic Hydroponics Linkables
ModMetaData.author: Averrin
ModMetaData.description:
Automatic Hydroponics Linkables adds new powered facilities that link to Automatic Hydroponics and modify processing speed and yield. Effects are data-driven and shown directly in the processing UI and menus.
Features - Fertilizer Injector: modest speed boost, low power, adjacent placement - Hydroponic AI Optimizer: stronger speed boost, higher power, adjacent, 2x2 - Yield Overclocker: doubles yield while making processes ~1.5x slower - Effective time and (if applicable) yield multiplier displayed in process list and options menu - Data-driven tuning per facility via modExtensions - Locked behind a single research after Fabrication + Hydroponics
New facilities - Fertilizer Injector - Power: low - Placement: adjacent - Effect: small speed increase per linked injector (capped) - Hydroponic AI Optimizer - Power: high; 2x2 - Placement: adjacent; single link - Effect: notable speed increase - Hydroponic Yield Overclocker - Power: moderate - Placement: adjacent; single link - Effect: 2x yield; ~1.5x slower processing
Research - Automatic Hydroponics Enhancements (after Fabrication + Hydroponics) - Unlocks all three facilities
Requirements - Automatic Hydroponics (parent mod) - Vanilla Expanded Framework
Warning: 1. This mod uses ugly AI-generated sprites, because I cannot draw, like at all. If you have images that I can use here, please share. 2. This mod is in Beta and not tesxted enough. 3.
